Creating a template from <em>{{titleWith: Creating a template from {{titleWithDefault}} is a non-destructive action – we'll make a copy of the document and turn it into a template that can be used as a starting point for new documents.
Sorry, part of the application failed to: Sorry, part of the application failed to load. This may be because it was updated since you opened the tab or because of a failed network request. Please try reloading.
Sorry, an unrecoverable error occurred{{: Sorry, an unrecoverable error occurred{{notified}}. Please try reloading the page, it may have been a temporary glitch.

You can't reorder documents in an alphab: You can't reorder documents in an alphabetically sorted collection

Starred documents could not be loaded: Starred documents could not be loaded

Delete collection: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?

Are you sure you want to make {{ userNam: Tem a certeza que deseja tornar {{ userName }} um administrador? Os administradores podem modificar as informações de faturação e da equipa.

Are you sure you want to make {{ userName }} a read-only viewer? They will not be able to edit any content

Name your token something that will help: Name your token something that will help you to remember it's use in the future, for example "local development", "production", or "continuous integration".

This collection is only visible to those: This collection is only visible to those given access

Are you sure about that? Deleting the <e: Deleting the {{collectionName}} collection is permanent and cannot be restored, however documents within will be moved to the trash.
Also, <em>{{collectionName}}</em> is bei: Also, {{collectionName}} is being used as the start view – deleting it will reset the start view to the Home page.
You can edit the name and other details: Podes editar o nome e outros detalhes a qualquer momento, no entanto fazer se fizeres isso frequentemente, poders confundir os teus colegas de trabalho.
Name: Nome
Export started, you will receive an emai: Export started, you will receive an email when it’s complete.
Exporting the collection <em>{{collectio: Exporting the collection {{collectionName}} may take a few seconds. Your documents will be a zip of folders with files in Markdown format. Please visit the Export section on settings to get the zip.
Collections are for grouping your docume: Collections are for grouping your documents. They work best when organized around a topic or internal team — Product or Engineering for example.
This is the default level of access, you: This is the default level of access, you can give individual users or groups more access once the collection is created.
When enabled any documents within this c: When enabled any documents within this collection can be shared publicly on the internet.

The <em>{{ collectionName }}</em> collec: The {{ collectionName }} collection is private. Team members have no access to it by default.
Team members can view documents in the <: Team members can view documents in the {{ collectionName }} collection by default.
Team members can view and edit documents: Team members can view and edit documents in the {{ collectionName }} collection by default.
When enabled, documents can be shared pu: When enabled, documents can be shared publicly on the internet.
Public sharing is currently disabled in: Public sharing is currently disabled in the team security settings.

This template will be permanently delete: This template will be permanently deleted in <2></2> unless restored.

Couldn’t create the document, try again?: Couldn’t create the document, try again?
Are you sure you want to permanently del: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the {{ documentTitle }} document? This action is immediate and cannot be undone.
Heads up – moving the document <em>{{ ti: Heads up – moving the document {{ title }} to the {{ newCollectionName }} collection will grant all team members {{ newPermission }}, they currently have {{ prevPermission }}.

A team admin (<em>{{ suspendedContactEma: Um administrador da equipa ({{ suspendedContactEmail }}) suspendeu sua conta. Para reativar sua conta, por favor, entre em contato diretamente com ele.
Are you sure about that? Deleting the <e: Are you sure about that? Deleting the {{groupName}} group will cause its members to lose access to collections and documents that it is associated with.
You can edit the name of this group at a: You can edit the name of this group at any time, however doing so too often might confuse your team mates.
Add team members below to give them acce: Adicione os membros da equipa abaixo para dar acesso ao grupo. Precisa adicionar alguém que ainda não esteja na equipa?
Add and remove team members in the <em>{: Add and remove team members in the {{groupName}} group. Adding people to the group will give them access to any collections this group has been added to.
Listing team members in the <em>{{groupN: Listing team members in the {{groupName}} group.
Groups are for organizing your team. The: Groups are for organizing your team. They work best when centered around a function or a responsibility — Support or Engineering for example.
You’ll be able to add people to the grou: You’ll be able to add people to the group next.
Weird, this shouldn’t ever be empty: Weird, this shouldn’t ever be empty

Sorry, you can only send {{MAX_INVITES}}: Sorry, you can only send {{MAX_INVITES}} invites at a time
Invite team members or guests to join yo: Invite team members or guests to join your knowledge base. Team members can sign in with {{signinMethods}} or use their email address.
Invite team members to join your knowled: Invite team members to join your knowledge base. They will need to sign in with {{signinMethods}}.
As an admin you can also <2>enable email: As an admin you can also <2>enable email sign-in</2>.
Want a link to share directly with your: Want a link to share directly with your team?

Where do I find the file?: Where do I find the file?
In Notion, click <em>Settings & Members<: In Notion, click Settings & Members in the left sidebar and open Settings. Look for the Export section, and click Export all workspace content. Choose HTML as the format for the best data compatability.
Drag and drop the zip file from Outline': Drag and drop the zip file from Outline's export option, or click to upload
You can import a zip file that was previ: You can import a zip file that was previously exported from an Outline installation – collections, documents, and images will be imported. In Outline, open Export in the Settings sidebar and click on Export Data.
Posting to the <em>{{ channelName }}</em: Posting to the {{ channelName }} channel on
These events should be posted to Slack: These events should be posted to Slack
These settings affect the way that your: These settings affect the way that your knowledge base appears to everyone on the team.
The logo is displayed at the top left of: The logo is displayed at the top left of the application.
The team name, usually the same as your: The team name, usually the same as your company name.
Your knowledge base will be accessible a: Your knowledge base will be accessible at
Choose a subdomain to enable a login pag: Choose a subdomain to enable a login page just for your team.
This is the screen that team members wil: This is the screen that team members will first see when they sign in.
A full export might take some time, cons: A full export might take some time, consider exporting a single document or collection. The exported data is a zip of your documents in Markdown format. You may leave this page once the export has started – we will email a link to {{ userEmail }} when it’s complete.
Manage optional and beta features. Chang: Manage optional and beta features. Changing these settings will affect the experience for all team members.
When enabled multiple people can edit do: When enabled multiple people can edit documents at the same time with shared presence and live cursors.
Groups can be used to organize and manag: Groups can be used to organize and manage the people on your team.
No groups have been created yet: No groups have been created yet
Quickly transfer your existing documents: Quickly transfer your existing documents, pages, and files from other tools and services into Outline. You can also drag and drop any HTML, Markdown, and text documents directly into Collections in the app.
Import a backup file that was previously: Import a backup file that was previously exported from Outline
Import pages from a Confluence instance: Import pages from a Confluence instance
Everyone that has signed into Outline ap: Everyone that has signed into Outline appears here. It’s possible that there are other users who have access through {team.signinMethods} but haven’t signed in yet.
Receive a notification whenever a new do: Receive a notification whenever a new document is published
Receive a notification when a document y: Receive a notification when a document you created is edited
Receive a notification whenever a new co: Receive a notification whenever a new collection is created
Tips on getting started with Outline`s f: Tips on getting started with Outline`s features and functionality
Receive an email when new features of no: Receive an email when new features of note are added
Unsubscription successful. Your notifica: Unsubscription successful. Your notification settings were updated
Manage when and where you receive email: Manage when and where you receive email notifications.
Your email address should be updated in: Your email address should be updated in your SSO provider.
The email integration is currently disab: The email integration is currently disabled. Please set the associated environment variables and restart the server to enable notifications.
Unable to upload new profile picture: Não é possível carregar uma nova foto de perfil
Choose a photo or image to represent you: Choose a photo or image to represent yourself.
This could be your real name, or a nickn: This could be your real name, or a nickname — however you’d like people to refer to you.
Please note that translations are curren: Please note that translations are currently in early access. Community contributions are accepted though our <2>translation portal</2>.
You may delete your account at any time,: Pode apagar a sua conta a qualquer momento, atenção que isso é irrecuperável
Are you sure you want to disable authori: Are you sure you want to disable authorized signups?
New account creation using <em>{{ authen: New account creation using {{ authenticationMethods }} will be disabled. New users will need to be invited.
Settings that impact the access, securit: Settings that impact the access, security, and content of your knowledge base.
When enabled, users can sign-in using th: When enabled, users can sign-in using their email address
The server must have SMTP configured to: The server must have SMTP configured to enable this setting
When enabled, documents can be shared pu: When enabled, documents can be shared publicly on the internet by any team member
Links to supported services are shown as: Links to supported services are shown as rich embeds within your documents
Allow members to create new collections: Allow members to create new collections within the knowledge base
Allow authorized <em>{{ authenticationMe: Allow authorized {{ authenticationMethods }} users to create new accounts without first receiving an invite
The default user role for new accounts. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
You can globally enable and disable publ: You can globally enable and disable public document sharing in the security settings.
Documents that have been shared are list: Documents that have been shared are listed below. Anyone that has the public link can access a read-only version of the document until the link has been revoked.
Whoops, you need to accept the permissio: Whoops, you need to accept the permissions in Slack to connect Outline to your team. Try again?
Something went wrong while authenticatin: Something went wrong while authenticating your request. Please try logging in again?
Get rich previews of Outline links share: Get rich previews of Outline links shared in Slack and use the {{ command }} slash command to search for documents without leaving your chat.
Connect Outline collections to Slack cha: Connect Outline collections to Slack channels and messages will be automatically posted to Slack when documents are published or updated.
The Slack integration is currently disab: The Slack integration is currently disabled. Please set the associated environment variables and restart the server to enable the integration.
You can create an unlimited amount of pe: You can create an unlimited amount of personal tokens to authenticate with the API. Tokens have the same permissions as your user account. For more details see the developer documentation.
Zapier is a platform that allows Outline: Zapier is a platform that allows Outline to easily integrate with thousands of other business tools. Head over to Zapier to setup a "Zap" and start programmatically interacting with Outline.'
There are no templates just yet.
You can create templates to help your te: You can create templates to help your team create consistent and accurate documentation.
A reciclagem encontra-se de momento vazia.
Are you sure? Deleting your account will: Are you sure? Deleting your account will destroy identifying data associated with your user and cannot be undone. You will be immediately logged out of Outline and all your API tokens will be revoked.
<em>Note:</em> Signing back in will caus: Note: Signing back in will cause a new account to be automatically reprovisioned.
